name: py-einops

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Flexible and powerful tensor operations for readable and reliable code.
Supports numpy, pytorch, tensorflow, and others.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-ci-sdr
dependent_to.description:
This repository contains an implementation for the Convolutive transfer
function Invariant Signal-to-Distortion Ratio objective for PyTorch as
described in the publication Convolutive Transfer Function Invariant SDR
training criteria for Multi-Channel Reverberant Speech Separation

dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-farm
dependent_to.description:
AlpacaFarm is a simulator that enables research and development on
learning from feedback at a fraction of the usual cost, promoting
accessible research on instruction following and alignment.

dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo
dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-fastfold
dependent_to.description:
Optimizing Protein Structure Prediction Model Training and Inference on
GPU Clusters.

dependent_to.name: py-vector-quantize-pytorch
dependent_to.description:
A vector quantization library originally transcribed from Deepmind's
tensorflow implementation, made conveniently into a package. It uses
exponential moving averages to update the dictionary.
